theme: International Criminal Tribunal for the Former Yugoslavia
entities: International Criminal Tribunal for the Former Yugoslavia
summary: The Security Council, recalling resolution 1581 (2005), takes note of the Secretary-General's letter of 27 March 2006, and decides to allow Judge Joaquín Canivell to continue sitting in the Krajišnik case beyond April 2006 and see it through to completion, despite exceeding three years of service at the International Criminal Tribunal for the Former Yugoslavia; and decides to remain seized of the matter.
